archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1469
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, if I am declined for the device I applied for but I could be accepted for a lower priced device, I want to be offered the option of purchasing this device on interest free instead, so that I don't walk away empty handed.

properties.value: DS: Credit check that would propose to change the basket content based on some rules

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
